product.description: This product is an AI-driven MMP (Mobile Measurement Partner) designed to transform customer data into actionable insights. It enables detailed tracking of top-performing distribution channels, providing granular visibility into every click, download, and onboarding event.

features.name: AI-driven Insights
features.description: Leverages artificial intelligence to extract powerful insights from customer data.

features.name: Channel Performance Tracking
features.description: Tracks top-performing distribution channels with detailed metrics.

features.name: Granular Event Tracking
features.description: Monitors specific user actions including clicks, downloads, and onboarding.

product.targeted_market: Businesses that rely on mobile app marketing and user acquisition, likely including mobile app developers, marketing agencies, and growth teams seeking to optimize their advertising spend and understand user behavior.
product.problem_product_is_solving: The product addresses the challenge of understanding the effectiveness of various marketing channels in driving app installs and user engagement. It solves the problem of having vast amounts of customer data but lacking the tools or expertise to convert it into meaningful, actionable insights for strategic decision-making and campaign optimization.
